code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./CourseList.css';import CourseModal from'../courseModal/CourseModal';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CourseList=_ref=>{let{courses}=_ref;const[selectedCourse,setSelectedCourse]=useState(null);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course-grid",children:[courses.map(course=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course-card",onClick:()=>setSelectedCourse(course),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/img/".concat(course.courseId,".svg"),alt:"Course ".concat(course.title),onError:e=>{e.target.src='/static/img/default.svg';}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"course-title",children:course.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Price:"})," ",course.price," NOK"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Difficulty:"})," ",course.difficulty]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Topic:"})," ",course.category]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Session:"})," ",course.session]})]},course.courseId)),selectedCourse&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CourseModal,{course:selectedCourse,onClose:()=>setSelectedCourse(null)})]});};export default CourseList;
